meanings.sent1: The plain and styleless dress did not catch anyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was so styleless that it blended in with the background.
meanings.sent3: The styleless room looked like it was stuck in a time warp.
meanings.sent4: The painting was so styleless, it seemed like a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The styleless design failed to impress even the most lenient critics.

meanings.definition: Without a distinctive or unique appearance.
meanings.sent1: The car was so styleless that it was hard to spot in the parking lot.
meanings.sent2: His writing was often criticized for being too styleless and generic.
meanings.sent3: The styleless building seemed to disappear among the more colorful ones.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was so styleless, it was like listening to white noise.
meanings.sent5: The styleless landscape lacked any defining features to make it memorable.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of creativity or originality.
meanings.sent1: The artist's styleless paintings all looked the same to the untrained eye.
meanings.sent2: His styleless jokes fell flat with the audience, who expected more wit.
meanings.sent3: The styleless movie plot was predictable from the very beginning.
meanings.sent4: Her styleless cooking lacked any unique flavors or spices.
meanings.sent5: The styleless presentation failed to engage the audience's interest.
